cn.description:
MagicKit AI – 全能设备与实用工具包

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的实用工具应用，旨在帮助您监控设备状态、优化性能，并从一个便捷界面访问日常工具。专为 iOS 打造，MagicKit AI 集合了多种核心功能，同时保护您的隐私并节省电池。

设备与系统工具：
• 电池状态：查看当前电量和充电状态
• 存储使用情况：分析可用与已用空间
• 设备信息：查看基本硬件与系统详情
• 运行时间监控：了解设备持续运行时间
• 电池使用建议：获取实用省电技巧
• 照片清理：检测并删除重复或相似照片以释放空间

网络工具：
• 网速测试：测量您的互联网连接速度
• Wi-Fi 信息：查看网络名称、IP 地址和连接状态
• IP 查询：查看公网 IP 的地理位置

实用工具：
• 单位换算器：支持多种单位互转
• 货币转换器：实时汇率与换算
• 日期时间计算器：支持工作日差值计算
• 时区转换器：全球时间转换，含夏令时支持
• 倒计时与提醒：创建美观倒计时，可自定义提醒与重复事件
• Magic 计数器：多项目统计追踪，含连续天数与数据统计
• 二维码扫描：快速识别二维码
• 文档扫描：高质量扫描保存文档
• 指南针与水平仪：使用设备传感器测量方向与水平
• 屏幕方向锁定：在应用内锁定屏幕方向
• 音频检测仪：通过麦克风测量环境音量
• 剪贴板管理器：访问并管理当前会话复制内容
• 手电筒：开启设备手电筒
• 亮度调节：直接在应用内调整屏幕亮度

功能亮点：
• 简洁易用的向导式界面
• 无广告，无内购
• 轻量节能
• 兼容所有 iOS 设备
• 工具持续更新添加
• 注重隐私与性能设计

适用人群：
• 设备状态监控与性能优化
• 日常换算与测量任务
• 文档与二维码扫描
• 照片清理释放空间
• 倒计时提醒管理
• 习惯追踪与进度统计
• 快速工具访问（如手电筒、亮度）
• 简易网络诊断

立即下载 MagicKit AI，用一个智能强大的工具包简化您的日常任务！

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

cn.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

hk.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

hk.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。

裝置與系統工具：

網路工具：

• Wi-Fi 資訊：查看網路名稱、IP 位址與連線狀態

實用工具：
• 單位換算器：支援各類單位轉換
• 貨幣換算器：即時匯率與幣值轉換
• 日期時間計算器：支援工作日計算的日期差異

• 倒數計時與提醒：建立美觀倒數計時，支援提醒與重複事件
• Magic 計數器：追蹤多個計數器，提供統計與連續天數
• QR 掃描器：快速掃描二維碼
• 文件掃描器：高品質掃描與儲存文件
• 指南針與水平儀：使用裝置感應器測量方向與水平
• 螢幕方向鎖定：於應用內鎖定螢幕方向
• 音量測量儀：透過麥克風測量環境音量
• 剪貼簿管理器：管理當前應用中的複製內容
• 手電筒：開啟裝置手電筒照明
• 螢幕亮度調整：可於應用內直接調整亮度

特色亮點：
• 簡潔直覺的導引式介面
• 無廣告、無內購
• 輕巧省電
• 支援所有 iOS 裝置
• 持續新增工具與更新
• 重視隱私與效能

適用族群：
• 裝置監控與效能優化
• 日常測量與轉換任務
• 掃描文件與 QR 碼
• 相片清理與空間管理
• 倒數提醒與計劃管理
• 追蹤習慣與統計進度
• 快速使用工具如手電筒與亮度調整
• 執行簡易網路測試診斷

hk.trackName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防生存戰爭
hk.description:
全球最讓人欲罷不能的防禦遊戲歸來——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：前線！》

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

《王國保衛戰》廣受好評：IGN編輯推薦、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、CNET最佳iPad遊戲"

While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

mo.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

mo.trackCensoredName: ATracker PRO - 每日時間管理
mo.description:
生命是寶貴的，你的時間也是如此。 ATracker幫助你記錄你的時間。

ATracker是一款時間記錄APP，非常易于使用，只需要很少的設定。它支援：一鍵啟動/停止時間記錄;條形圖或餅圖顯示您的時間去向;完全可定制的用戶界面;用標簽對任務進行分類;CSV和PDF資料匯出;在多個設備之間同步資料;通過Apple Watch，Widget和Siri開始/停止記錄。
這是一個全新的方式來組織你的一天。

范圍
ATracker是一種干凈簡約的追蹤方式：
 - 工作中的不同任務和專案
 - 學校研究和專案
 - 健身
 - 社交
 - 家庭作業
 - 嬰兒或兒童日常活動
 - 業余愛好專案
 - 或任何人們想要記錄和時間管理的活動

功能特色:
 - 只需輕按一下即可開始和停止記錄任務。
 - 今日的時間使用概覽。
 - 目標系統。
 - 完整的活動日志。專案歷史記錄。添加錯過或修改現有的時間記錄。
 - 自定義活動，有數百個圖標可供選擇。您還可以對任務設定顏色。
 - 柱狀圖和餅型圖報告。
 - 按標簽分組任務，并允許用戶按今日標簽上的標記過濾任務，以及在報告中顯示持續時間或次數。
 - 任務記時即使在設備關閉時仍然工作。
 - 任務定時. 鬧鈴即使在套用關閉狀態仍然會響
 - 手勢支援
 - 小部件
 -  Apple Watch支援
 -  Siri快捷方式
 - iPad支援Split View和Slide Over的多任務支援。
 - 使用PDF和CSV檔案匯出資料。
 - 能夠為每個任務條目記錄文本注釋。
 - 完全自定義具有更多外觀的UI，并允許用戶使用自己的圖片作為背景。

WEB訂閱
通過Web訂閱，ATracker支援跨多個設備進行同步。除App外，它還提供對ATracker服務的Web訪問。此附加組件是可選的。
在套用內購買的 ATracker 服務會依照您的套餐每月或每年續訂。套餐價格可能會因國家/地區而異。
 - 費用將在確認購買時向您的iTunes賬號收取
 - 您的訂閱會自動更新，除非您在已付費期間結束前至少24小時關閉自動更新
 -  您的賬號會在已付費期間結束前24小時內被再次收費
 -  您可以在購買后前往賬號設定管理訂閱并關閉自動更新
 -  您無法在已付費期間內取消購買
 - 如果您的試用還未結束，剩余的天數在您開始訂閱后會自動失效

APP支援
訪問https://support.wonderapps.se或通過support@wonderapps.se與我們聯系
服務條款：https://atracker.pro/atracker_TOS.html
隱私政策：https://atracker.pro/atracker_policy.html

mo.description:
MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。

裝置與系統工具：

實用工具：

• 剪貼簿管理器：管理當前應用中的複製內容

• 輕巧省電
• 支援所有 iOS 裝置
• 持續新增工具與更新
• 重視隱私與效能

適用族群：

• 日常測量與轉換任務
• 掃描文件與 QR 碼
• 相片清理與空間管理

• 追蹤習慣與統計進度
• 快速使用工具如手電筒與亮度調整
• 執行簡易網路測試診斷

立即下載 MagicKit AI，使用一款智慧又強大的工具箱，簡化您的日常工作與生活！

mo.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

tw.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

**********************
更新的功能：
1. 減重
2. 餐瘦身
3. 減肥
4. 進度追踪
5. 設定和實現目標
6. 膳食指導

tw.description:
在現今快節奏的生活中，越來越多的人開始關注自己的健康和體重，同時也嘗試在有限的預算內實現這些目標。Roman 應用是一個全面的解決方案，專為那些希望實現減肥運動、減肥餐、減脂等目標的人設計。無論您是關心健康管理、身材管理、營養、瘦身計劃、卡路里追踪、身體變化、飲食習慣、熱量消耗、營養價值、健身目標、體重監測、飲食建議、營養平衡還是飲食健康，Roman 應用都能滿足您的需求。

以下是 Roman 應用的主要特點，將幫助您在預算內實現健康和減肥目標：
• 個性化膳食計劃: Roman 應用的核心功能之一是個性化的膳食計劃。無論您是想要減重、增肌還是保持健康，應用都能根據您的目標和偏好，提供一個度身定制的飲食計劃。您只需輸入您的當前體重，就能獲得一份詳細的膳食計劃，而不必擔心財政壓力。
• 經濟實惠的健康生活: Roman 應用還提供了有關營養、膳食準備和卡路里意識選擇的實用建議。您將學會如何在預算內享受到美味的食物，同時實現健康目標。我們明白，過多的開支可能會限制您的選擇，因此我們的飲食計劃設計得非常實惠。
• 進度追踪: 成功的減肥旅程需要持之以恆的努力和監控。Roman 應用內置了跟踪功能，可以幫助您密切關注您的進展。您可以輕鬆追踪自己的卡路里攝入和消耗，同時查看您實現理想體重的路程。這有助於您保持動力並負責到底。
• 設定和實現目標: 設定健康和減肥目標是成功的第一步。Roman 應用可以幫助您設定實際的目標，並跟踪您的進度。無論您是想要擁有更健康的生活方式還是減肥成功，這個應用都能夠幫助您實現您的目標。
• 經濟實惠的膳食計劃: 當談到減肥時，飲食是成功的關鍵之一。Roman 應用的經濟實惠的膳食計劃可以幫助您優化飲食，以確保在不花大錢的情況下實現目標。我們明白，預算限制可能會成為挑戰，因此我們的飲食計劃設計得非常實惠。
• 卡路里在預算內追踪: 卡路里攝入和支出對於減肥至關重要。Roman 應用提供了一個功能強大的卡路里追踪工具，可幫助您確保您的卡路里攝入在預算內。這是實現減肥和預算健康目標的重要步驟。

Roman (體重管理、減肥日記) 應用是實現更健康、經濟實惠生活方式的理想選擇。不再需要花大錢參加昂貴的減肥計劃，也不再需要擔心飲食選擇會給您的錢包帶來壓力。我們的應用提供了您實現健康和減肥目標所需的工具和指導。無論您的目標是減肥、改善健康還是簡單地更節儉地生活，Roman 應用都能幫助您實現這些目標。從今天開始，使用 Roman 應用，開啟您的經濟實惠減肥之旅！

tw.trackName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防生存戰爭
tw.description:
全球最讓人欲罷不能的防禦遊戲歸來——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：前線！》

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

《王國保衛戰》廣受好評：IGN編輯推薦、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、CNET最佳iPad遊戲"

MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。

裝置與系統工具：
• 電池狀態：查看目前電量與充電情況
• 儲存空間使用：分析已用與可用空間
• 裝置資訊：查看基本硬體與系統資訊
• 開機時間追蹤：監控裝置開機持續時間
• 電池小貼士：提供實用省電建議
• 相片清理：偵測與刪除重複或相似相片釋放空間

網路工具：
• 網速測試：測量網路連線速度
• Wi-Fi 資訊：查看網路名稱、IP 位址與連線狀態
• IP 查詢：查看公網 IP 的地理位置資訊

實用工具：
• 單位換算器：支援各類單位轉換
• 貨幣換算器：即時匯率與幣值轉換
• 日期時間計算器：支援工作日計算的日期差異
• 時區轉換器：全球時間轉換，支援夏令時間顯示
• 倒數計時與提醒：建立美觀倒數計時，支援提醒與重複事件
• Magic 計數器：追蹤多個計數器，提供統計與連續天數
• QR 掃描器：快速掃描二維碼
• 文件掃描器：高品質掃描與儲存文件
• 指南針與水平儀：使用裝置感應器測量方向與水平
• 螢幕方向鎖定：於應用內鎖定螢幕方向
• 音量測量儀：透過麥克風測量環境音量
• 剪貼簿管理器：管理當前應用中的複製內容
• 手電筒：開啟裝置手電筒照明
• 螢幕亮度調整：可於應用內直接調整亮度

特色亮點：
• 簡潔直覺的導引式介面
• 無廣告、無內購
• 輕巧省電
• 支援所有 iOS 裝置
• 持續新增工具與更新
• 重視隱私與效能

適用族群：
• 裝置監控與效能優化
• 日常測量與轉換任務
• 掃描文件與 QR 碼
• 相片清理與空間管理
• 倒數提醒與計劃管理
• 追蹤習慣與統計進度
• 快速使用工具如手電筒與亮度調整
• 執行簡易網路測試診斷

立即下載 MagicKit AI，使用一款智慧又強大的工具箱，簡化您的日常工作與生活！

tw.trackName: 照片橡皮擦 - 去除水印雜物多余人物
tw.description:
妳還在為照片上不請自來的過客犯愁嗎？
使用照片橡皮擦，有瑕疵的照片瞬間修復，變成完美收藏。
照片橡皮擦可以輕松幫妳去除圖片上的電線、人物、圖標、水印、文字等等雜物，就和拍照壹樣簡單。
照片橡皮擦使用智能算法自動填補受損和缺失的區域，智能填充來到了妳的手機，P圖再也不需要壹臺電腦。
特點：
- 刪除多余的人物
- 擦除照片上的電線
- 擦除臉上的粉刺，黑痣
- 修復有劃痕的舊照片
- 去除照片上意外的移動物體
- 去除照片上的水印、日期等等等等
- 簡單易用

什麽，還有不能完成的其他P圖任務，看看我們的其他軟件，總有壹款能幫到妳：
• 輕松摳圖 - 史上最強摳圖神器.
• 色彩大師 - 改變照片顏色,黑白多彩特效.
• 美圖聚焦 - 虛化背景, 模糊背景, 美化照片, 突出運動健美的妳.
• 奇幻變臉秀 - 制作變臉動畫，照片變視頻，GIF圖片.

給我們壹個評論，幫助我們提高app的功能！

tw.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

us.description:
MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life.

Device and System Tools
• Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state
• Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage
• Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details
• Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running
• Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage
• Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space
• Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries
• RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance
• Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance

Network Tools
• Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed
• Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status
• IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses
• Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude

Security & Privacy Tools
• Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options
• Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases
• UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats
• Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options
• Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection

Utility Tools
• Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements
• Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies
• Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support
• Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status
• Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events
• Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks
• QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly
• Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition
• Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors
• Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app
• Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone
• Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session
• Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness
• Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup
• Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more
• Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers — perfect for designers and creatives

Highlights
• Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools
• Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities
• No ads or in-app purchases
• Lightweight and battery-efficient
• Compatible with all iOS devices
• Frequent updates with new tools
• Built with privacy and performance in mind
• Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations

Perfect for
• Device monitoring and optimization
• Everyday measurement and conversion tasks
• Scanning documents and QR codes
• Cleaning up photo storage and contacts
• Creating and managing countdowns with reminders
• Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters
• Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control
• Performing simple network diagnostics
• Generating secure passwords and managing privacy
• Taking quick notes and organizing information
• Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects

Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

us.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
us.releaseNotes:
- 适配 iOS 26
- 支持液态玻璃效果
us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

tr.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

tr.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

tr.description:
MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker

Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions.

■ CORE FEATURES
• Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions
• Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management
• Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues
• Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments

■ COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT
• Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards)
• Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking
• Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation)
• Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates

■ THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS
• Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records
• Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances
• Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection
• Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format
• Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule
• Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders
• Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs

■ CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE
Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are.

■ FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT
We do one thing only — help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life.

Device and System Tools
• Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state
• Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage
• Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details
• Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running
• Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage
• Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space
• Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries
• RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance
• Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance

Network Tools
• Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed
• Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status
• IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses
• Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude

Security & Privacy Tools
• Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options
• Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases
• UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats
• Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options

Utility Tools
• Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements
• Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies
• Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support
• Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status
• Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events
• Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks

• Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors

• Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session
• Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness

Highlights
• Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools

• No ads or in-app purchases
• Lightweight and battery-efficient
• Compatible with all iOS devices
• Frequent updates with new tools

Perfect for

• Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control

Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

tr.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

tr.description:
Play MONOPOLY on the go without distractions – no ads, no fuss! 

Challenge friends, family and fans from around the globe in the digital version of the official MONOPOLY board game, licensed by Hasbro. 

Head online to play your favourite board game with anyone, anywhere, at any time, or compete against state-of-the-art AI opponents offline. Plus, with the seamless PASS & PLAY mode, you can play the classic MONOPOLY board game with your friends with just one device! 

The classic MONOPOLY board game takes a bold leap into a new format, arriving on mobile with amazing graphics, smooth animations and a catchy soundtrack! 


HOW TO PLAY MONOPOLY

1. Download the official MONOPOLY app
2. Press “PLAY”
3. Pick a mode, board, dice and token
4. Roll the dice and move around the board
5. If you land on a property tile, you can buy it
6. Collect rent when other players land on it
7. Continue around the board, drawing cards when instructed – will you be hit with a surprise tax? Sent to jail? Or get a little bonus money? 
8. If you run out of money, you’ll be bankrupt and out of the game
9. The last player left with a profit wins! 

FEATURES

- MONOPOLY ON THE GO – No connection? No problem. Our roster of AI opponents are ready to challenge you! Or play with your friends offline with Pass & Play! 
- MULTIPLE MODES – Take on AI opponents in Single Player or compete against friends and family in Pass & Play or Online With Friends. Try out Online Multiplayer and face off against fellow tycoons from around the world! 
- EXCLUSIVE BOARDS – Experience the iconic board game like never before with exclusive boards and more! 
- AWESOME NEW TOKENS AND DICE – Whatever your style, MONOPOLY has a set of dice fit for a future tycoon! Pick from nostalgic classic tokens or brand-new designs exclusive to the mobile game.

Get the most authentic MONOPOLY experience with the official MONOPOLY mobile game!
